001package org.biopax.psidev.ontology_manager.impl;
002
003import org.apache.commons.logging.Log;
004import org.apache.commons.logging.LogFactory;
005import org.biopax.psidev.ontology_manager.OntologyAccess;
006import org.biopax.psidev.ontology_manager.OntologyManager;
007import org.biopax.psidev.ontology_manager.OntologyTermI;
008import org.springframework.util.ResourceUtils;
009
010import java.io.ObjectInputStream;
011import java.io.ObjectOutputStream;
012import java.io.UnsupportedEncodingException;
013import java.net.*;
014import java.nio.file.Files;
015import java.nio.file.Path;
016import java.nio.file.Paths;
017import java.nio.file.StandardOpenOption;
018import java.util.*;
019
020/**
021 * Access to the specified bio/chem ontologies (loaded from several OBO format files).
022 *
023 * @author Florian Reisinger
024 * @author Samuel Kerrien (skerrien@ebi.ac.uk)
025 * @author rodche (baderlab.org) - simplified it for BioPAX Validator
026 * @since 2.0.0
027 */
028public class OntologyManagerImpl implements OntologyManager {
029
030  private static final Log log = LogFactory.getLog(OntologyManagerImpl.class);
031  private static final String TMPDIR = System.getProperty("java.io.tmpdir");
032
033  /**
034   * The Map that holds the Ontologies.
035   * The key is the ontology ID and the value is a ontology inplementing the OntologyAccess interface.
036   */
037  private Map<String, OntologyAccess> ontologyMap = new HashMap<>();
038
039  public OntologyManagerImpl() {
040  }
041
042  public void putOntology( String ontologyID, OntologyAccess ontologyAccess ) {
043    if ( ontologyMap.containsKey( ontologyID ) ) {
044      log.warn( "OntologyAccess with id='" + ontologyID + "' already exists; overwriting" );
045    }
046    ontologyMap.put( ontologyID, ontologyAccess );
047  }
048
049  public Set<String> getOntologyIDs() {
050    return ontologyMap.keySet();
051  }
052
053  public OntologyAccess getOntology( String ontologyID ) {
054    return ontologyMap.get( ontologyID );
055  }
056
057  public boolean containsOntology( String ontologyID ) {
058    return ontologyMap.containsKey( ontologyID );
059  }
060
061  public synchronized void loadOntologies( Properties config )
062    throws OntologyLoaderException
063  {
064    if ( config != null && !config.isEmpty()) {
065      for ( Object ontId : config.keySet() ) {
066        String key = (String) ontId;
067        String resource = config.getProperty(key);
068        try {
069          log.info( "Loading ontology: " + key + ", " + resource);
070          OntologyAccess oa = fetchOntology( key, resource);
071          putOntology(key, oa);
072        } catch ( Throwable e ) {
073          throw new OntologyLoaderException("Failed fetching ontology " + key + " from " + resource, e);
074        }
075      }
076    } else {
077      throw new OntologyLoaderException("OntologyAccess config map is missing or empty");
078    }
079  }
080
081  private synchronized OntologyAccess fetchOntology( String ontologyID, String resource) throws Exception {
082    OntologyAccess oa = null; // to make
083
084    final Path serialized = Paths.get(TMPDIR,ontologyID + "_" + resource.hashCode() + ".bin");
085    //deserialize if the cache file exists
086    if(Files.exists(serialized)) {
087      try {
088        oa = (OntologyAccess) new ObjectInputStream(Files.newInputStream(serialized, StandardOpenOption.READ))
089          .readObject();
090        log.info( "Loaded ontology " + ontologyID + " from cache " + serialized );
091      } catch (Exception e) {
092        log.error("Failed to deserialize ontology from cache " + serialized, e);
093      }
094    }
095
096    if(oa == null) {// load the ontology from the resource
097      try {
098        URL url = ResourceUtils.getURL(resource);
099        oa = new OboLoader().parseOboFile(url, ontologyID);
100        oa.setName(ontologyID);
101        log.info( "Loaded ontology " + ontologyID + " from " + resource );
102        // serialize (reusable cache file)
103        try {
104          new ObjectOutputStream(Files.newOutputStream(serialized,
105            StandardOpenOption.CREATE,
106            StandardOpenOption.TRUNCATE_EXISTING)
107          ).writeObject(oa);
108          log.info( "Serialized " + ontologyID + " to a cache file " + serialized);
109        } catch (Exception e) {
110          log.error("Failed to serialize " + ontologyID + " to: " + serialized, e);
111        }
112      } catch (Exception e) {
113        throw new OntologyLoaderException("OBO file loader failed", e);
114      }
115    }
116
117    return oa;
118  }
119
120  public Set<OntologyTermI> searchTermByName(String name) {
121    return searchTermByName(name, null);
122  }
123
124  public Set<OntologyTermI> searchTermByName(String name, Set<String> ontologies) {
125    Set<OntologyTermI> found  = new HashSet<>();
126    assert name!=null : "searchTermByName: null arg.";
127
128    Set<String> ontologyIDs = new HashSet<>(getOntologyIDs());
129    if(ontologies != null && !ontologies.isEmpty())
130      ontologyIDs.retainAll(ontologies);
131
132    for(String ontologyId: ontologyIDs) {
133      OntologyAccess oa = getOntology(ontologyId);
134      for(OntologyTermI term : oa.getOntologyTerms()) {
135        String prefName = term.getPreferredName();
136        if(prefName == null) {
137          log.error("searchTermByName: null preferred name for term "
138                      + term.getTermAccession() + " in " + ontologyId + "; report to authors.");
139        } else if(name.equalsIgnoreCase(prefName)) {
140          found.add(term);
141        } else {
142          for(String syn : term.getNameSynonyms()) {
143            if(syn.equalsIgnoreCase(name)) {
144              found.add(term);
145            }
146          }
147        }
148      }
149    }
150
151    return found;
152  }
153
154  public OntologyTermI findTermByAccession(String acc) {
155    OntologyTermI term = null;
156
157    for(String ontologyId : getOntologyIDs()) {
158      term = getOntology(ontologyId).getTermForAccession(acc);
159      if(term != null)
160        break;
161    }
162
163    return term;
164  }
165
166  /*
167   *    Some CV URI/URLs may include
168   *  'obo.' in it (now deprecated) or not, like e.g.
169   *  'obo.so', 'obo.go' vs. simply 'so', 'go'
170   */
171  public OntologyTermI getTermByUri(String uri) {
172    if (uri.startsWith("urn:miriam:obo.")) {
173      int pos = uri.indexOf(':', 15); //e.g. the colon after 'go' in "...:obo.go:GO%3A0005654"
174      String acc = uri.substring(pos + 1);
175      acc = urlDecode(acc);
176      OntologyTermI term = findTermByAccession(acc); // acc. is globally unique in CvService!..
177      return term;
178    } else if (uri.startsWith("http://identifiers.org/obo.")) {
179      int pos = uri.indexOf('/', 27); //e.g. the slash after 'go' in "...obo.go/GO:0005654"
180      String acc = uri.substring(pos + 1);
181      OntologyTermI term = findTermByAccession(acc);
182      return term;
183    } else if (uri.startsWith("urn:miriam:")) {
184      int pos = uri.indexOf(':', 11); //e.g. the last colon in "...:go:GO%3A0005654"
185      String acc = uri.substring(pos + 1);
186      acc = urlDecode(acc);
187      OntologyTermI term = findTermByAccession(acc);
188      return term;
189    } else if (uri.startsWith("http://identifiers.org/")) {
190      int pos = uri.indexOf('/', 23); //e.g. the slash after 'org/go' in "...org/go/GO:0005654"
191      String acc = uri.substring(pos + 1);
192      OntologyTermI term = findTermByAccession(acc);
193      return term;
194    } else {
195      if (log.isDebugEnabled())
196        log.debug("Cannot Decode not a Controlled Vocabulary's URI : " + uri);
197      return null;
198    }
199  }
200
201  private String urlDecode(String acc) {
202    try {
203      return URLDecoder.decode(acc,"UTF-8");
204    } catch (UnsupportedEncodingException e) {
205      throw new RuntimeException(e.toString());
206    }
207  }
208
209  public Set<OntologyTermI> getDirectChildren(String urn) {
210    OntologyTermI term = getTermByUri(urn);
211    OntologyAccess ontologyAccess = getOntology(term.getOntologyId());
212    Set<OntologyTermI> terms = ontologyAccess.getDirectChildren(term);
213    return terms;
214  }
215
216  public Set<OntologyTermI> getDirectParents(String urn) {
217    OntologyTermI term = getTermByUri(urn);
218    OntologyAccess ontologyAccess = getOntology(term.getOntologyId());
219    Set<OntologyTermI> terms = ontologyAccess.getDirectParents(term);
220    return terms;
221  }
222
223  public Set<OntologyTermI> getAllChildren(String urn) {
224    OntologyTermI term = getTermByUri(urn);
225    OntologyAccess ontologyAccess = getOntology(term.getOntologyId());
226    Set<OntologyTermI> terms = ontologyAccess.getAllChildren(term);
227    return terms;
228  }
229
230  public Set<OntologyTermI> getAllParents(String urn) {
231    OntologyTermI term = getTermByUri(urn);
232    OntologyAccess ontologyAccess = getOntology(term.getOntologyId());
233    Set<OntologyTermI> terms = ontologyAccess.getAllParents(term);
234    return terms;
235  }
236
237  public boolean isChild(String parentUrn, String urn) {
238    return getAllParents(urn).contains(parentUrn)
239             || getAllChildren(parentUrn).contains(urn);
240  }
241
242  public OntologyTermI findTerm(OntologyAccess ontologyAccess, String term)
243  {
244    OntologyTermI ot;
245
246    if (ontologyAccess == null) {
247      ot = findTermByAccession(term);
248    } else {
249      //otherwise continue with more specific lookup
250      ot = ontologyAccess.getTermForAccession(term);
251
252      if (ot == null) {
253        //search again using the parameter as term's name/synonym
254        Set<OntologyTermI> ots = searchTermByName(term,
255          Collections.singleton(ontologyAccess.getName()));
256        if (ots.size() == 1) //use if unambiguous
257          ot = ots.iterator().next();
258        else
259          log.info("ambiguous term: " + term +
260                     " found by searchig in ontology: " + ontologyAccess.getName());
261      }
262    }
263
264    return ot;
265  }
266
267}
